argumentText:
ARGUMENT
j

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fsumclf.ph | |- F/ k ph |
| 2 |  | fsumclf.a | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 3 |  | fsumclf.b | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_csbeq1a | |- ( k = j -> B = [_ j / k ]_ B ) |
| 5 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ j A |
| 6 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ k A |
| 7 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ j B |
| 8 |  | #P_nfcsb1v | |- F/_ k [_ j / k ]_ B |
| 9 | 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_cbvsum | |- sum_ k e. A B = sum_ j e. A [_ j / k ]_ B |
| 10 | 9 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B = sum_ j e. A [_ j / k ]_ B ) |
| 11 |  | #P_nfv | |- F/ k j e. A |
| 12 | 1, 11 | #P_nfan | |- F/ k ( ph /\ j e. A ) |
| 13 | 8 | #P_nfel1 | |- F/ k [_ j / k ]_ B e. CC |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_nfim | |- F/ k ( ( ph /\ j e. A ) -> [_ j / k ]_ B e. CC ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( k = j -> ( k e. A <-> j e. A ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_anbi2d | |- ( k = j -> ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) <-> ( ph /\ j e. A ) ) ) |
| 17 | 4 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( k = j -> ( B e. CC <-> [_ j / k ]_ B e. CC ) ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_imbi12d | |- ( k = j -> ( ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) <-> ( ( ph /\ j e. A ) -> [_ j / k ]_ B e. CC ) ) ) |
| 19 | 14, 18, 3 | #P_chvar | |- ( ( ph /\ j e. A ) -> [_ j / k ]_ B e. CC ) |
| 20 | 2, 19 | #P_fsumcl | |- ( ph -> sum_ j e. A [_ j / k ]_ B e. CC ) |
| 21 | 10, 20 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B e. CC ) |
